alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Comal; Guadalupe; Hays; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 1:17AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hays, northern Guadalupe, southwestern Blanco, eastern Kendall and central Comal Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 116 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Guadalupe River State Park, or 14 miles northeast of Boerne, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Kyle, Dripping Springs, Wimberley, Blanco, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Bulverde, Woodcreek, Bear Creek, Staples, Guadalupe River State Park, Kendalia, Smithson Valley, Spring Branch, Payton, Fischer, Twin Sisters, Driftwood and Bergheim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
